parameters.content:
1-Trigger Node – When Executed by Another Workflow
“This workflow is designed to be reusable. It receives a raw_address from any parent workflow and returns a standardized address.”

2-Function Node – Clean Address
“Cleans and formats the raw address. Capitalizes street, city, and country. Handles missing parts safely.”

3-Optional Google Sheet Node
“Append cleaned addresses here for auditing. This step is optional but recommended for tracking results.”
“Skill workflow is modular: can be called by multiple parent workflows. Never hard-code input — always accept JSON from the parent.”
